name: places/ChIJp7Q7JJhZwokRZLXHDO1mHVU
formattedAddress: 190 1st Ave. Ground Floor, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 190 1st Ave. Ground Floor, New York, NY 10009-4004, USA

originalText.text: Hell yeah, this place is the bomb. Mischa is so wonderful to be around, and the space itself feels like a secret clubhouse in the Mediterranean. I came in with hair I was just downright bored with and no idea what I wanted - and Mischa did not disappoint. Left Treehouse with a killer haircut, grinning from ear to ear, feeling like a beautiful butterfly without any truly DRAMATIC change like shaving my head or a complete colour overhaul. A good cut, and an ATTENTIVE, HONEST, KIND STYLIST make a world of a difference. Go here.

originalText.text: I love going to Treehouse for my highlights and haircuts.  The vibe is relaxed and the people are fantastic.  Ricardo is an incredibly talented colorist and now I entrust my blonde highlights only to him!  The color and tone is perfection every time.  Shout out to Mischa as well for her exceptional skills cutting curly hair.

text.text: I love going to Treehouse for my highlights and haircuts.  The vibe is relaxed and the people are fantastic.  Ricardo is an incredibly talented colorist and now I entrust my blonde highlights only to him!  The color and tone is perfection every time.  Shout out to Mischa as well for her exceptional skills cutting curly hair.

originalText.text:
I have been getting my hair cut by Mischa for several years and every haircut is wonderful and stylish.
I only get it cut 3 or 4 times a year and they grow out beautifully.
I get bang trims in between cuts and Mischa always makes time for me.
She is not just a hairdresser, but a style visionary.
I can’t recommend her enough.

originalText.text: OMG I am OBSESSED! Mischa gave me the most gorgeous new haircut!! The space is beautiful & the vibes are immaculate. The cherry on top was the 90's pop playlist!! I'd give 100 stars if possible :)

text.text: OMG I am OBSESSED! Mischa gave me the most gorgeous new haircut!! The space is beautiful & the vibes are immaculate. The cherry on top was the 90's pop playlist!! I'd give 100 stars if possible :)

originalText.text:
I am a POC curly hairstylist of 10 years and wanted to try Mischa out since I’ve been following her work. The atmosphere was cool. Beautiful salon, very eclectic and designed well. That’s why I gave it two stars.

I’m sure everyone there is talented, but My haircut wasn’t good at all. My curls are coarser and tighter than I think she was used to, and she made bad judgment on telling me to come with my hair “as is” which was about 4 days old, and some stretching from wearing it up. She literally chopped at my curls in an unnatural state, and ruined my shape that I’ve been growing in for 2.5 years. She cut so much length off, and lazily styled it after to complete the cut, which resulted in more unevenness, because it wasn’t even laying right after the styling.

I even reached out ahead to confirm if any hair prep was  needed for the cut and was told to still come “as is.” I should’ve trusted my own expertise, but I try to trust any artist “process”. I haven’t been able to wear it down for 3 weeks now, and won’t be able to until It grows out. The shape is awful, it’s like a bush. I gave it 3 weeks of trying different products, air drying, diffusing, before asking for a refund. It is what it is, it’ll grow back, but I def won’t go back. I’ll go back to my old stylist.

She was nice about the refund for the service, so there’s that. My hair is lowkey ruined tho. Check the photos below, what i asked for didn’t need a lot of length cut. The picture in black was maybe a day or two before her cut. It wasn’t even the shape I asked. It’s just a bad bush now. I’m shook.

The first two were my length and shape before Mischa chopped it, the eyes blocked were what she left me with. I noticed they weren’t loading correct, so I updated the post.
